rules.formula: OR( ISPICKVAL(Party_Type__c,'Architect'), ISPICKVAL(Party_Type__c,'Borer'), ISPICKVAL(Party_Type__c,'Borewell Office'), ISPICKVAL(Party_Type__c,'Builder'), ISPICKVAL(Party_Type__c,'Consultant'), ISPICKVAL(Party_Type__c,'Contractor'), ISPICKVAL(Party_Type__c,'Customer'), ISPICKVAL(Party_Type__c,'Engineer'), ISPICKVAL(Party_Type__c,'Farmer'), ISPICKVAL(Party_Type__c,'Government'), ISPICKVAL(Party_Type__c,'Institution'), ISPICKVAL(Party_Type__c,'Plumber'), ISPICKVAL(Party_Type__c,'Mechanic'), ISPICKVAL(Party_Type__c,'Others'), ISPICKVAL(Party_Type__c,'Plumbing Contractor'), ISPICKVAL(Party_Type__c,'Project Manager'), ISPICKVAL(Party_Type__c,'Purchase Manager'), ISPICKVAL(Party_Type__c,'Site Engineer'), ISPICKVAL(Party_Type__c,'Site Incharge / Supervisor'))
